introduction.whoAmI: I am a QA Engineer Lead, with many experiences including software development, technical training and product release management. I'm constantly inspired working with diverse and knowledgeable individuals both within the organization and outside of it on a global scale with Partners. I bring to the table the visions of high quality software and processes advocating for user focused features, universally accessible design, and positive developer experiences.

aboutMe.desc: A veteran QA experienced with leading and owning the QA function in engineering or partner enablement programs from zero.
Developed, extended and configured various developer tools and test frameworks (Integration, E2E, Performance) that contribute to software quality.
An advocate of best development practices which including optimizing branching, orchestrating build, test & deploy infrastructure.

Extensive experience testing mobile and desktop applications in functionality, performance, accessibility, design and security. Can comfortably own test development, execution and consultancy of said applications.

Experienced in cross departmental collaboration. Organizing all relevant stakeholders; PMâ€™s, Engineers and QA involved to ensure proper communication, maximization of available resources and effective triage of risks to ensure smooth quality product releases.
Passionate with improving developer experience, engineering velocity and team engagement. This includes introducing principles, values and processes that maximize optimal practices.

education.name: Bachelor of Science, Software Systems @ Simon Fraser University
education.desc: In October of 2016, I graudated from Simon Fraser University earning Bachelor of Science in Software Systems by the Faculty of Applied Sciences, along with a Co-op Certificate of Completion for acquiring 16 months of industry experience.

education.name: Highschool IB Diploma @ Britannia Secondary School
